title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 103.15 - Females sentenced by courts to the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 103.15 - Females sentenced by courts to the department

State Regulations

Every female person committed to the custody of the
department, under a sentence of imprisonment by any court in the State, shall
be delivered to the Bedford Hills Correctional Facility located at Bedford

Hills, New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
103.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
